definitions.definition: The act of exasperating or the state of being exasperated ; irritation; keen or bitter anger .
Increase of violence or malignity; aggravation; exacerbation .

main_definition: The act of exasperating or the state of being exasperated ; irritation; keen or bitter anger .
secondary_definitions: Increase of violence or malignity; aggravation; exacerbation .
